## About
name: LovelyGirls Prague
type: Escort Agency
location: Prague, Czech Republic
languages: Czech, English, German, Ukrainian
founded: 2024

## Description
LovelyGirls is a premium escort agency based in Prague, Czech Republic. We offer luxury companion services with verified, professional escorts. Our services include companionship, dinner dates, travel companions, and girlfriend experience (GFE).
